name: Surreptitious Glance (V)
Lore: 'After working together for a long time, Lando and Lobot developed a speechless form of commnication.',
Text: 'If this card is lost from your Reserve Deck, it satisfies an additional 2 Force loss. If your Lando and Lobot are defending in a battle, add two destiny to power only and one battle destiny.',
